targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /${host}/ and
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r._field == "uptime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load5")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${host}" and 
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r._field == "n_cpus")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and  r.host == "${host}" and r._field == "usage_idle" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r: r.usage_idle * -1.0 + 100.0}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_iowait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_threads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_users")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_containers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_containers_running")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_containers_stopped")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_containers_paused")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

  from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total" or r._field == "cached" or r._field == "free" or r._field == "buffered" or r._field == "used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_system" or r._field == "usage_softirq" or r._field == "steal" or r._field == "usage_nice" or r._field == "usage_irq"  or r._field == "usage_iowait"  or r._field == "usage_guest"  or r._field == "guest_nice")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu =~ /$cpu$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used", mean(free) as "free" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "free" or r["_field"] == "total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] == "${container_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "message")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airflow_dagbag_size")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airflow_executor_open_slots")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airflow_executor_running_tasks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airflow_executor_queued_tasks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airflow_scheduler_tasks_running")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airflow_scheduler_tasks_executable")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airflow_dag_processing_import_errors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "gauge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airflow_scheduler_heartbeat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "counter")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airflow_dagrun_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upper")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "timing")
  |> group(columns: ["dag_id"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airflow_dag_processing_last_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dag_id"] != "Global" and r["dag_id"] != "SlackUtil")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
